div.head: Revenue Monotonicity
div.p: From single-good auctions, we have the intuition that adding bidders means more competition, and hence more revenue for the auctioneer.

div.head: Does this intuition extend to combinatorial auctions?
div.p: A CA mechanism is revenue monotonic if dropping a bidder never increases the auction's revenue.
